message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $9000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I can do $8500, which is a bit above your offer, but still a good compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice! I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $7500. Would you be willing to meet me at $8000?
